
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(gridExtra)
library(scatterplot3d)
library(MASS)
region.lm.N15 <- lm(N15 ~ Region, data = nitrogen_data)
summary(region.lm.N15)
region.anova.N15 <- aov(N15 ~ Region, data = nitrogen_data)
region_lm_per <- lm(Percent ~ Region, data = nitrogen_data)
summary(region_lm_per)
region.anova.per <- aov(Percent ~ Region, data = nitrogen_data)
summary(region.anova.N15)
summary(region.anova.per)
TukeyHSD(region.anova.N15)
TukeyHSD(region.anova.per)
TukeyHSD(aov(N15 ~ Region * Division, data = nitrogen_data))
plot(region.anova.N15)
plot(region.anova.per)

#Regions are different, except for NWHI and Johnston Atoll for percent
```

```{r}
MHI.zone.N15 <- aov(N15 ~ Zone, data = MainHI)
MHI_zone_lm_N15 <- lm(N15 ~ Zone, data = MainHI)
MHI.zone.per <- aov(Percent ~ Zone, data = MainHI)
MHI_zone_lm_per <- lm(Percent ~ Zone, data = MainHI)

summary(MHI_zone_lm_N15)
summary(MHI_zone_lm_per)
summary(MHI.zone.N15)
summary(MHI.zone.per)

## Differences between zones

plot(MHI.zone.N15)
plot(MHI.zone.per)
```

```{r}
MHIshlw_N15_aov <- aov(N15 ~ Genus + Location + as.factor(Depth), data = MHI.shlw)
MHIshlw_per_aov <- aov(Percent ~ Genus + Location + as.factor(Depth), data = MHI.shlw)
MHImeso_N15_aov <- aov(N15 ~ Genus + Location + as.factor(Depth), data = MHI.meso)
MHImeso_per_aov <- aov(Percent ~ Genus + Location + as.factor(Depth), data = MHI.meso)
summary(MHIshlw_N15_aov)
summary(MHIshlw_per_aov)
summary(MHImeso_N15_aov)
summary(MHImeso_per_aov)

## Location is not important for shallow water samples, but was important for mesophotic N15. 


#Need to run Tukeys to determine differences in factors 
TukeyHSD(aov(N15 ~ Genus + Location, data = MHI.meso))



ggplot(data = MHI.shlw, aes(x = Depth, y = N15)) + geom_point(aes(color = Genus)) + geom_smooth(aes(linetype = Genus, color = Genus), method = 'loess')
```

```{r}
#subset MHI into location by zone

summary(aov(N15 ~ Genus + Depth, data = Oahu.meso))
summary(aov(Percent ~ Genus +Depth, data = Oahu.meso))
summary(aov(N15 ~ Genus + Depth, data = Maui.meso))
summary(aov(Percent ~ Genus +Depth, data = Maui.meso))
summary(aov(N15 ~ Genus + Depth, data = Molokai))
summary(aov(Percent ~ Genus +Depth, data = Molokai))

ggplot(data = Oahu.meso, aes(x = Depth, y = N15)) + geom_point(aes(color = Genus)) + geom_smooth(aes(linetype = Genus, color = Genus), method = 'loess')
```
